Nextcloud-Official.description:
Next generation open source Enterprise File Sync and Share.

This rock-on uses a simple SQLite database and may thus be limited to single-user or lightweight use. Similarly, it does not use encryption.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/_/nextcloud, available for amd64 architecture only.
Nextcloud-Official.more_info: No smbclient installed by default. If you would like to enable this you can connect to your container and use apt-get install smbclient -y to install.
